[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Hero Section” _builder_version=”4.25.0″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_direction=”116deg” background_color_gradient_stops=”#282723 0%|rgba(0,0,0,0) 74%” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”#282723″ background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” background_color_gradient_end_position=”74%” background_image=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/Scan-Bauer-Golden-key-HR.jpg” custom_padding=”10%||10%||false|false” saved_tabs=”all” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row admin_label=”Hero Area” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”46px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.20.4″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”|||on|||||” header_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_font_size=”79px” header_line_height=”1.2em” header_2_font=”||||||||” header_2_text_color=”#6b0906″ header_2_font_size=”74px” background_layout=”dark” animation_style=”fade” header_font_size_tablet=”” header_font_size_phone=”40px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

finding ourselves in fairy tales

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.21.0″ text_text_color=”#282723″ header_text_color=”#d9c2a3″ header_2_text_color=”#D9C2A3″ header_2_font_size=”33px” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” header_3_text_color=”#d9c2a3″ header_4_text_color=”#d9c2a3″ header_2_font_size_tablet=”29px” header_2_font_size_phone=”24px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

A three-part self-study course

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#282723″ custom_padding=”||0px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.2″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#D9C2A3″ hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

This course is not currently available.

If you’re interested in a live program which offers a much deeper dive, please head over here to read about my 8-month Graduate Certificate program at Pacifica Graduate Institute: ‘Finding Ourselves in Fairy Tales: A Narrative Psychological Approach’. Begins March 12, 2025.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.27.2″ background_color=”#282723″ min_height=”795.4px” custom_padding=”2px||5px|||” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” disabled_on=”on|on|on” disabled=”on” sticky_enabled=”0″][et_pb_row custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”797.4px” custom_padding=”53px||51px|||” custom_padding_tablet=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.21.0″ header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”Raleway|300||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#fed593″ header_2_font_size=”30px” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Course description

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.21.0″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” z_index_tablet=”500″ text_text_align=”left” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We are storytelling animals, hard-wired for story. We begin to perceive, explain and make sense of the world through the stories we find in childhood – or the stories which find us. They are the stars we navigate by. Stories teach us everything we know, and their lessons are deep and rich. In fairy tales, for example, the tasks which must be undertaken are the stuff out of which souls, not just shirts, are forged. These stories help us to reimagine ourselves, because at the heart of them is transformation: they help us to believe in the possibility of change. We come to see that there are other ways of imagining the world and our place in it – and of living more intensely, and more richly, in a world that is often filled with challenge, and sorrow.

I’ve worked in this way – as a psychologist, academic folklorist, writer and teacher – with European fairy tales now for more than two decades. Join me to explore the ways in which, even as adults, we can find ourselves in fairy tales.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.20.4″ header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”Raleway|300||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#fed593″ header_2_font_size=”30px” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Course structure

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.21.0″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” z_index_tablet=”500″ text_text_align=”left” global_colors_info=”{}”]

SESSION 1

  • What are fairy tales, and how and why do they change over time?
  • How do they help us?
  • Where does their magic come from, and why are they so memorable?
  • Working with images and narrative elements in fairy tales
  • Reimagining fairy tales for our lives and the times
  • Homework: rewriting a fairy tale

SESSION 2

  • Discussion and sharing: rewriting a fairy tale
  • Archetypal patterns in fairy tales – what are archetypes and wjy are they so important?
  • The fairy-tale heroine’s journey – how does it differ from other models?
  • Writing life as a fairy tale
  • Homework: rewrite your own life as a fairy tale

SESSION 3

  • Discussion and sharing: writing our life as a fairy tale
  • Other ways to work with stories: dreamwork and active imagination work
  • Creating your own inner imaginarium

HOW IT WORKS

Our gatherings took place via Zoom. A considerable collection of additional resources – written material, an audio journey, reading recommendations and web links – are available to download.

Once you have signed up (below) you’ll be taken to a welcome page for this course, where you’ll find all the material.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ disabled_on=”on|on|on” _builder_version=”4.27.2″ background_color=”#FCFCF2″ custom_margin=”-6px|||||” custom_padding=”5px||36px|||” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” disabled=”on” sticky_enabled=”0″][et_pb_row custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.16″ min_height=”326px” custom_padding=”4px||0px|||” custom_padding_tablet=”30px||||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”10px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.20.4″ header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”Raleway|300||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#893E39″ header_2_font_size=”30px” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” custom_padding=”45px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

How TO JOIN

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.21.0″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#282723″ header_font=”||||||||” header_3_font=”Raleway|300|||||||” header_3_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_3_font_size=”28px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_margin=”||-140px|||” z_index_tablet=”500″ text_text_align=”left” global_colors_info=”{}”]

The fee for this self-study course is £50. Please follow the link below to make your payment using any credit or debit card. (For those of you in other countries: currency exchange rates change by the hour, and so we’re not able to tell you what the cost of this course is in your currency. This currency converter offers you live rates, though they may or may not reflect the rates actually given to you by your bank or credit card provider. It will, however, give you an indication.)

IMPORTANT: While paying and registering, if you do not already have an account on this website, you will be asked to create a username and password which will allow you to log into the Members’ Area, select ‘Bone Cave’ from the dropdown members’ menu, visit this event’s ‘Welcome’ page, and so access the video and other material. It’s important that you make a note of these details; you won’t be able to access your resources if you do not have them. If you already have an account, please make sure you use the same username and password to ensure you can see all your courses in the same place.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_code _builder_version=”4.20.4″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.20.4″ text_text_color=”#282723″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Please note in particular, before purchasing, that no refunds can be given for this event.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Workshops and Events Section” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”0px||0px|” saved_tabs=”all” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”0″ make_equal=”on” admin_label=”About Area” _builder_version=”4.17.4″ background_color=”#44393d” width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_margin=”0px||0px” custom_padding=”0px||0px|” use_custom_width=”on” width_unit=”off” custom_width_percent=”100%” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_enable_color=”off” background_image=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/wolves-left-OPT.jpg” custom_padding=”7%|5%|7%|5%|true|false” custom_padding_tablet=”33%||33%||true|false” custom_padding_phone=”” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.17.4″ background_color=”#44393d” background_enable_image=”off” custom_padding=”5%|5%|5%|5%|true” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font=”|300||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font_size=”34px” custom_padding_tablet=”10px||||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

JOIN MY PACK

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#c34d49″ divider_weight=”2px” _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”50px” custom_padding=”20px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.4″ text_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font=”|300||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font_size=”34px” custom_margin=”||41px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Subscribe to my free monthly newsletter on Substack, and be among the first to hear all the latest news about my books, courses and events – as well as personal seasonal reflections and reading recommendations. You’ll also receive signed book and course giveaways that are exclusively for subscribers, and a special gift as a thank you for joining me!

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”https://sharonblackie.substack.com” url_new_window=”on” button_text=”JOIN MY LIST” _builder_version=”4.17.4″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”18px” button_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ button_bg_color=”#c34d49″ button_border_width=”4px” button_border_color=”#c34d49″ button_border_radius=”100px” button_font=”|300||on|||||” button_use_icon=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

excerpt.rendered: Join me in this online program to explore the many ways in which we can reimagine ourselves through fairy tales.
